Constructor Detail

Logo.Shaper

public Logo.Shaper()
Creates a landed Logo located at (0.0, 0.0) position, using the winding rule defined by Path2D.WIND_NON_ZERO for generated shapes.

See Also:
Path2D.WIND_NON_ZERO

Logo.Shaper

public Logo.Shaper(int windingRule)
Creates a landed Logo located at (0.0, 0.0) position, using the specified winding rule for generated shapes. Valid parameters are Path2D.WIND_NON_ZERO and Path2D.WIND_EVEN_ODD.

See Also:
Path2D.WIND_NON_ZERO, Path2D.WIND_EVEN_ODD
